lead_paragraph: With a few counties still refusing to allow same-sex marriages as they issued licenses to heterosexual couples, a federal judge ruled Wednesday that all must abide by court decisions allowing same-sex unions.

headline.main: Alabama: Counties Told to End Bias in Issuing Marriage Licenses
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Counties Told To End Bias In Issuing Marriage Licenses

snippet: With a few counties still refusing to allow same-sex marriages as they issued licenses to heterosexual couples, a federal judge ruled Wednesday that all must abide by court decisions allowing same-sex unions.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
